title: THE HORNED GOD Chronicles: Skull Bearer
description: Raghu, the son of Solankhis Clan Leader Dilipa struggles to save not only his clan but the whole humanity from Ignorance. His chance encounter with a Sage reveals a whole new world of possibilities in this First book of THE HORNED GOD chronicles. With the wisdom of elders and his own courage, he takes the responsibility of Clan Shamanï¿½s secret, on himself in a time when danger lurks all around as men who are filled with lust of Power will go to any extremes to meet their own ends.
author: Rudra Kapalin
